role.title: Role
role.description: Defines a user role within the system.

name.description: The name of the role (e.g., ADMIN, CUSTOMER).

permissionSet.title: Permission Set
permissionSet.description: Defines the permissions for a specific role across all modules.

modulePermissions.title: Module Permissions
modulePermissions.description: Defines the actions a role can perform on a specific module.

roles/{roleId}.description: Stores the list of available roles.

permissions/{roleId}.description: Stores the permission matrix for each role.
